src_original: tathā hi- samādherguṇeṣvabhisampratyayalakṣaṇayā śraddhayā tatra yogino 'bhilāṣa utpadyate /
tato 'bhilāṣād vīryamarabheta /  tadvīryabalena kāyacittakarmaṇyatām (Bhk 184) āsādayati /  tataḥ praśrabdhakāyacetasaḥ kausīdyam āvartate /  ataḥ śraddhādayaḥ kausīdyaprahāṇāya bhāvanīyāḥ /
layauddhatyāpraśamanakāle tvanābhogadoṣaḥ tatpratipakṣeṇa ca cetanā bhāvanīyā /
layauddhatyapraśame sati yadā cittaṃ praśamavāhi tadābhogadoṣaḥ,
